thread.title: Cambridge University Pushes Back Against Facebook Scrutiny of Research Apps

author: Georgi Kantchev
title: Cambridge University Pushes Back Against Facebook Scrutiny of Research Apps

organizations.name: cambridge university pushes back against facebook scrutiny of research apps

text:
LONDON—The uproar over how Facebook Inc. protects user data has spurred an unusual sideshow: a public spat between the social network and one of the world’s oldest academic institutions.
In testimony on Capitol Hill this week, Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg said the firm would probe whether problems with data harvesting may have extended beyond a single researcher at the University of Cambridge. 

The... RELATED VIDEO The Key to Understanding Facebook's Current Crisis Facebook's current data crisis involving Cambridge Analytica has angered users and prompted government investigations. To understand what's happening now, you have to look back at Facebook's old policies from 2007 to 2014. WSJ's Shelby Holliday explains. Illustration: Laura Kammerman
